Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player

Class ScoreboardX2p

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player.ScoreboardX2p
All Implemented Interfaces:
Scoreboard, Serializable
public class ScoreboardX2p extends Object implements Scoreboard, Serializable
Class that represents the scoreboard of every player, it contains the entrance section, the dining room section and the professors owned by the player
See Also:
